Hire & Installation Process

Phase 1: Estimating & Survey

  • Quick turnaround on digital quotes followed by an on-site technical survey to assess ground conditions and load requirements.

Phase 2: RAMS & Compliance

  • Submission of Risk Assessments and Method Statements (RAMS) and structural calculations where required.

Phase 3: Erection & Handover

  • Professional installation by CISRS-trained operatives followed by a formal Handover Certificate and Scaftag installation.
